mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_hotgoods ( goods_id, goods_name, sort_id, goods_intro, price, is_deleted, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version ) values (#{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{sortId}, #{goodsIntroduce}, #{price}, #{isDeleted}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
mapper.select:
select goods_id, goods_name, sort_id, goods_intro, price, is_deleted, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version from t_sys_hotgoods where is_deleted = 0
and goods_name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
and goods_id like concat('%', #{goodsId}, '%')
order by sort_id asc

select goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, class_one classOne, class_two classTwo, goods_status FROM t_sys_goodsinfo where is_deleted = 0
and goods_name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
and goods_id like concat('%', #{goodsId}, '%')
mapper.update: update t_sys_hotgoods set goods_id = #{goodsId}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, sort_id = #{sortId}, goods_intro = #{goodsIntroduce}, price = #{price}, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, version = version + 1 where sort_id = #{sortId} and version = #{version}
update t_sys_region set value = #{showCnt} where id = '9999' and version = #{version}
